problem_text_cn: 如图,已知▱ABCD的四个内角的平分线分别相交于点E、F、G、H,连接AC．若EF=2,FG=GC=5,则AC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the bisectors of the four inner corners of ▱ABCD intersect at points E, F, G, and H respectively. Connect AC. If EF = N_0, FG = GC = N_1, then the length of AC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,作AP⊥CH交CH的延长线与P．∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,▱ABCD的四个内角的平分线分别相交于点E、F、G、H,∴易证四边形EFGH是矩形,四边形AEHP是矩形,△ABE≌△CDG,可得PA=FG=5,AE=PH=CG=5,CP=CG+PH+GH=2+10=12,在Rt△APC中,AC=∠\beta=∠ZZN=√{PA^{2}+PC^{2}}=13．故选:B．
